tpl.dbms

Interface Item

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ItemImpl

    public interface Item
    Interface that represents a database item, it keeps information like: item identifier (key), value, lock state, read_timestamp, write_timestamp, transactions holding this item and transactions waiting for it.
    Author:
    alangr28
